pullRequest.body:
This PR adds some missing API for constructing a homomorphism from a `MulSemiringAction`s. We already have `MulSemiringAction.toRingAut`.

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

Pull request successfully merged into master.

maintainer merge

bors merge

Thanks!

maintainer merge

Thanks!

FWIW, I have the following table in [my thesis](https://www.repository.cam.ac.uk/items/9ad1ac65-48c4-49cd-a00c-3cec6397a93b) about this and the use of `compHom` (warning: lean 3!)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/32b5d484-4d82-45d9-9720-87d6c1126f01)

bors merge

Thanks!
I'm not sure what the precedence is between `â†’*` and `â‰ƒâ‚[R]`. Can you parenthesise the comment, at least?

```suggestion
  smul g r := h g r
```
Also below
I think this is just `MulSemiringAction.compHom h` (so can be dropped)?
Can you add the same crossref as `toAlgEquiv` has?
In fact, I think this should be called `toAlgAut` and reference `MulSemiringAction.toRingAut` and `DistribMulAction.toModuleEnd`.
This one should also just be `MulSemiringAction.compHom h` (so can be dropped).

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: construct homomorphism from `MulSemiringAction`
